p: Solvent-based extraction (chloroform, methanol, water, petroleum ether, ethanol) and photochemical screening of the secondary metabolites from D. hatagirea reveal antimicrobial and other lifesaving pharmaceutical applications. Effects of azithromycin and amikacin-resistant bacteria ( E. coli) are highly neutralized by root and shoot extracts of D. hatagirea [ 81, 84]. Root extracts show significantly greater potential than glibenclamide against increased levels of certain blood ingredients in Wistar rats [ 101]. Detailed applications of different extracts of D. hatagirea are shown in Table 4.
